android.widget
Class CursorTreeAdapter.MyCursorHelper

java.lang.Object
  android.widget.CursorTreeAdapter.MyCursorHelper
Enclosing class:
CursorTreeAdapter
 class CursorTreeAdapter.MyCursorHelper
extends Object

Helper class for Cursor management:

  • Data validity
  • Funneling the content and data set observers from a Cursor to a single data set observer for widgets
  • ID from the Cursor for use in adapter IDs
  • Swapping cursors but maintaining other metadata
